動物用藥品名稱: 龍馬躍犬瘟熱、腺病毒第二型、小病毒、副流行性感冒活毒、鉤端螺旋體病不活化混合疫苗
業者名稱: 台灣龍馬躍股份有限公司
效能(適應症): 預防犬隻感染犬瘟熱、腺病毒第二型、鉤端螺旋體病、小病毒、副流行性感冒。
ingredients: FREEZE- DRIED PELLET:DISTEMPER VIRUS(BA STRAIN), AT LEAST 10^4.0 CCID50;CANINE ADENOVIRUS(CAV2 STRAIN),AT LEAST 10^2.5 CCID50;CANINE PARVOVIRUS(CAG STRAIN), AT LEAST 10^4.9CCID50;PARAINFLUENZA TYPE 2 VIRUS(CGF2004/75), AT LEAST 10^4.7CCID50;DILUENT : INACTIVATED LEPTOSPIRA CANICOLA(WEYBRIDGE 86500 16 070)&INACTIVATED LEPTOSPIRA ICTEROHAEMORRHAGIAE(WEYBRIDGE 86500 16 069)...QS FOR THE PROTECTION ACCORDING TO THE EUROPEAN PHARMACOPOEIA(BACTERIAL COUNT MINIMUM EXPECTED RESULT AT WORKING SEED LEVEL=10^6.0 LEPTOSPIRE/ML OF CULTURE).
